name: Neon Color Block Puzzle 2
description:
Neon Color Block Puzzle 2!!!
Enjoy the pleasure of glow puzzle. Train your puzzle game skills with this Neon jigsaw game. No time limit, no color matching, no match 3 repetition! Just fill the board with different shapes. Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
Features:
* Glow coloring themed puzzle.
* Easy to play, and FREE block game for all ages.
* Elegantly design and Support leaderboard,
* Don't worry! No time limits! No Internet limits
